The {{Lang|'''Mystic Onmyou Chamber'''|ja=訣籙陰陽寮|ja_rm=Ketsuroku On'you-ryou|ja_tl=Secrets and Talismans Onmyou Bureau}} is an event [[Domain]] encountered during the [[Labyrinth Warriors]] event.

The domain works much like the [[Spiral Abyss]]: Progress is saved for each trial so you can return later, and energy/health is stored separately for each trial. Each trial floorplan and layout is randomly generated. It is unsure if enemies spawned is by group or individually.

==Trivia==
*The domain was once owned by the onmyouji [[Kamuna Harunosuke]].
*The Japanese name uses the term {{Lang|On'you-ryou|ja=陰陽寮|ja_lit=Yin-Yang Bureau}}, an agency of Japan that existed from 701 until 1869 responsible for {{w|Onmyōdō|onmyoudou}} (divination), astronomy, calendar, and standard timekeeping.
